paper_abstract: In this paper we prove the Ahlswede-Khachatrian conjecture [1] up to a finite number of cases, which can be checked using modern computers. This conjecture implies the conjecture from [2] and the Manickam-Mikls-Singhi conjecture.
paper_title: Minimum Number of Edges in a Hypergraph Guaranteeing a Perfect Fractional Matching and the MMS Conjecture
